In the next few steps, you'll tell Plex: За кілька наступніх кроків, ви вкажете Plex де розміщюеться ваша музика, відео та фото. Plex створить непервершувану бібіліотеку та організує ваші файли.
We will then show you how to get iOS, An: We will then show you how to get iOS, Android, Mac, PC, and Connected TV apps so that you can access your library from any devices you own, both inside the home and on the go.
Please check that this file exists and t: Будь ласка, перевірте наявнисть цього файлу, а також приєднання потрібного пристрію
Analyzes all the media files in the libr: Analyzes all the media files in the library section. The analysis captures information about the media which helps Plex decide how to optimally play back the media.
Cleans up the library database and ensur: Cleans up the library database and ensures it is operating as quickly as possible. This is especially useful when you've added or removed a large amount of media from the library.
Publishing a server makes it automatical: Publishing a server makes it automatically available on your client devices without any configuration of your router.
The media server stores information abou: The media server stores information about your media to disk, as well as posters, artwork, and other media resources from the Internet. Running this task deletes any bundles which are no longer in use.
Plex organizes your library into section: Plex organizes your library into sections, organized by type. You can add as many sections as you want, and you can have multiple sections with the same type.
Removes a library section and all items: Removes a library section and all items inside. It does not delete any media files. View progress and ratings are preserved, in case any of the items are added in the future.
Name: Ім'я
Forces a download of fresh media informa: Пришвидшує завантаження оновленої інформації про медіа-файли з інтернету. Це може зайняти багато часу. Заблоковані поля залишаться не зміненими.

Every link that you email to this addres: Every link that you email to this address will be added to your myPlex queue. Add it to your address book so you can easily email links from your iPhone, iPad, Android, or any other device.

Let's start by giving your Plex server a: Let's start by giving your Plex server a friendly name so it can identify itself to other computers on the network. If you leave it blank, your computer name will be used.
Would you like to help us make Plex bett: Would you like to help us make Plex better for everyone? We collect anonymous data, which we use to improve the service over time.
If you would like to receive announcemen: If you would like to receive announcements about Plex, please enter your email address below. Don't worry, we won't send you spam.
myPlex makes it easy to get to your medi: myPlex makes it easy to get to your media no matter where you are.
With a myPlex account you will be able t:
With a myPlex account you will be able to queue up video from your browser,
access your content from outside your home and easily share content with friends and family.
See, that wasn't too bad, right? At this: See, that wasn't too bad, right? At this very moment, Plex is working tirelessly to build your library, and make it look beautiful. Like, there are at least a dozen mice on spinny wheels inside your computer, all peddling furiously.
Feel free to watch Plex work, or take th: Feel free to watch Plex work, or take this opportunity to download some Plex apps!

While Plex Media Server will automatical: While Plex Media Server will automatically download updates for Plex/Web periodically, use "Check for Updates" to manually download updates.

When multiple resolutions are available: When multiple resolutions are available for a video, automatically use the highest possible resolution.

Populates the allowed networks setting w: Populates the allowed networks setting with 127.0.0.1/255.255.255.255. This requires other computers on a local network to authenticate with myPlex before accessing the server.

Prefer AAC over MP3 when transcoding aud: Prefer AAC over MP3 when transcoding audio. Some devices, like the Wii U, only support HLS with AAC audio.
This name will be used to identify this: This name will be used to identify this media server to other computers on your network. If you leave it blank, your computer's name will be used instead.

Number of seconds to wait before a plugi: Number of seconds to wait before a plugin times out
Capability checking ensures that plug-in: Capability checking ensures that plug-ins that are incompatible with this version of the server or the current client application you are using are hidden. Disabling capability checking is useful during development, but will enable access to plug-ins that may perform unreliably with certain client applications.

Timeout in seconds segmented transcodes: Timeout in seconds segmented transcodes wait for the transcoder to begin writing data
Duration in minutes to use when transcod: Duration in minutes to use when transcoding something with an unknown duration
Directory to use when transcoding for te: Directory to use when transcoding for temporary files
Amount in seconds to buffer before throt: Amount in seconds to buffer before throttling the transcoder
Show the WebKit window used by plugins i: Show the WebKit window used by plugins instead of placing it off screen
Enable Media Link down-mixing of DTS aud: Enable Media Link down-mixing of DTS audio.
Media Link does not support DTS audio in: Media Link does not support DTS audio in certain regions. The Plex Media Server can automatically convert DTS to stereo so that it will play.

Allows the player to play compatible med: Allows the player to play compatible media without any conversion. In most browsers, direct play supports mp4 videos with h264 video and AAC audio. Subtitles will not be included if a video is played directly.
Allows the server to copy compatible aud: Allows the server to copy compatible audio and video streams without converting them.
